com.yantra.api.ycd

Interface recordShortageForPack

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.YCDApi, YIFApi

    public interface recordShortageForPack

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document recordShortageForPack(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      recordShortageForPack is primarily used for container packing.

    • Method Detail

      • recordShortageForPack

        org.w3c.dom.Document recordShortageForPack(YFSEnvironment env,
                                           org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                           java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                           com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException

        recordShortageForPack is primarily used for container packing. This API is used to record the shortage reason of the shipment or shipment lines which will arise during container packing for a ship from store order.

        The Shipment element will be returned in the output

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD
        *

        Validations:


          If Shipment does not exist for the passed data in Shipment element. Error Code : YDM00289.

          If the shortage is recorded at Shipment level and it does not have any shorted Lines. Error Code : YCD00019.

          If the shortage quantity is either zero or exceeds the quantity at shipment line level. Error Code : YCD00021.

          If the shortage reason is not specified in the input. Error Code : YCD00070.

          If the shortage reason specified in the input is invalid. Error Code : YCD00017.

        User Exits: None

        Events Raised: None

        Audits: None

        Pre Conditions: None

        Post Conditions: None

        Output Template Support: Only for Shipment Details.

        Database Extensibility Support: No

        Configuration Required for Backward Compatibility: No

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        A XML document that contains shipmenet details ready for customer pickup.For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.

        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Yantra exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
